CustomField.formula: (CASE( Lead_Generation_Branded__c , '1',1, '2',2, 0)+ CASE( Client_Voice_Style_Met__c , '1',1, '2',2, 0)+ CASE( Appropriate_Hashtags__c , '1',1, '2',2, 0)+ CASE( Spelling_Grammar__c , '1',1, '2',2, 0)+ CASE( Correct_Links__c , '1',1, '2',2, 0)+ CASE( CTA_for_Artist__c , '1',1, '2',2, 0)+ CASE( Proper_Formatting__c , '1',1, '2',2, 0))/14
